short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to enjoy several tools for the YouTube page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What the extension does is extend functionalities to the YouTube page to make the user experience more pleasant by adding tools that can be deactivated by the user.
